alert.note: Alert for Early; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Houston, western Miller, southwestern Early and northwestern Seminole Counties through 330 PM EDT/230 PM CDT/... At 254 PM EDT/154 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Donalsonville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Gordon, Jakin, Saffold, Howards Mill, Mayhaw, Cuba, Killarney, Enterprise, Lucy, Farley Nuclear Plant, Cedar Springs and Hentown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
